title: Children's aggression: its origin and control (TEFC)
brief_description: Examines the basis for normal aggression in young children, and presents methods for effectively managing this behaviour. Laboratory demonstrations and filmed examples of children’s aggression illustrate its types and causes
description: Examines the basis for normal aggression in young children, and presents methods for effectively managing this behaviour. Laboratory demonstrations and filmed examples of children’s aggression illustrate its types and causes
